Header: Actor Ryan Vanroyan remanded till April 11th
Content: Actor Ryan Vanroyan who was apprehended in Dubai and deported to the country has been remanded until the 11th of this month. The remand order was given by the Matara Magistrate’s Court today. Five more who were arrested in Dubai with Makandure Madush a criminal gang member, arrived at the Katunayake International Airport yesterday. On arrival, Ryan Vanroyan was interrogated by the Criminal Investigations Department and the Police Narcotics Bureau for more than eighteen hours. It is revealed that singer Amal Perera had introduced Ryan Vanroyan to Makandure Madush. It was thereafter he was handed over to the Weligama Police for investigations related to the possession of heroin. The Criminal Investigations Department produced him before the Matara Magistrate’s Court. Thereafter Ryan Vanroyan was remanded until the 11th of this month.
